regen.absent_element: specific indication of busy line or network issue
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an audible and visual indication to the driver specifying whether a call connection failure is due to a busy line or network issues.
If the call is not received by the controller, an audible and visual indication will include information indicating if the line is busy or there are network issues.

regen.absent_element: distinct indications for busy line vs network issues
regen.new_specification: For unsuccessful call attempts, provide distinct audible and visual indications to differentiate between a busy line and network issues.

label: This shall also indicate if the called party was busy or if the network could not connect the call.
absence: specific indication of unsuccessful connect: busy or network error
